opening_theme: #1: "Pre-Parade (プレパレード)" by Rie Kugimiya, Yui Horie, and Eri Kitamura (eps 1-16)
ending_theme: #1: "Vanilla Salt (バニラソルト)" by Yui Horie (eps 1-16)
